column5: Simple bedroom setup: Full-size mattress, private bathroom, full closet with hangers and chest of drawers, private TV with Xbox 360, games, DVDs, private workspace and access to shared amenities (kitchen, washer/dryer, living room). Located less than a mile from Northpark mall, 5 minutes from SMU, 10 minutes from downtown or Love field, and adjacent to major roads 75, 635, and Northwest Highway.
column8: Private Bed & Bath in the heart of Dallas
